# slope

**Instance Property**

The slope at the location toward the direction of travel, measured in degrees.

## Declaration

```swift
var slope: Double? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the slope measurement is invalid, this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0].

## Getting speed and slope

- **speed**: The instantaneous velocity of the device, measured in meters per second.
- **maxAbsSlope**: The maximum absolute slope at the location toward all directions, measured in degrees.
